HDG.DL.content: each man, each instant, in dialogue w/ forbears, perhaps even more, and more hidden, w/ those who will come after (Nachkommen) [inheritance, promise, future full of ghosts]

HDG.DL.content: language as Koto ba > Koto: Ereignis (of lightening message of grace), that which gives delight, itself, that which, uniquely in each unrepeatable moment (unwiederholbaren Augenblick) comes to radiance (Scheinen) in fullness of its grace [instant of gift]

HDG.LP.content: [program] all formulas are dangerous: force what’s said into superficiality (Äusserlichkeit) of instant opinion (raschen Meninens), can corrupt thinking > but can also prompt sustained reflection

HDG.EC.content: devastation (Verwüstung): everything (human, world, earth) will transform into desert (Wüste) > desert is already there, doesn’t accumulate little by little, is there in an instant (Nu), in order to draw everything to it, to desert-ify (ver-wüsten)
